brief.brief: Use this form to maintain the holiday schedule table.
You must an entry in this table for each different holiday schedule.

detail.detail: The entries consist of a table name, the names or descriptions of the holidays within the schedule, how long each holiday lasts, and the starting date of the holiday.
- The table name must be unique.
- The holiday names, lengths, and dates must match up within each schedule.
- You may keep as many holidays within each schedule, or as many schedules, as you require.
To scroll the table, your cursor must be on the table name.
To scroll the holidays within the schedule, the cursor must be on one of the other fields.
To eliminate a holiday within a schedule, blank out that line.
To eliminate a schedule, blank out the entire schedule.
On update, Service Manager moves everything up.
